summary: The kind of mod I make when bored...Just for entertainment value!
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]GOOGjFMlIBk[/youtube]

[b][u]ABOUT[/b][/u]
Essentially a re-textured Volendrung that sends enemies flying and plays an amusing \"boing\" sound effect :P

This is purely for entertainment value and isn\'t meant to be taken seriously at all...and it was only a five minute job(well, more like a couple of hours in total, but you know what I mean).

It should automatically appear in your inventory after receiving an on-screen message about two seconds after loading the game.


[b][u]DISCLAIMER[/b][/u]
As with all mods, you should backup your saves before installingâ€”just in case :)


[b][u]CREDITS[/b][/u]
Well, obviously my thanks goes to Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK.

I also wish to thank [url=http://www.freesound.org/people/plingativator/]plingativator[/url] from [url=http://www.freesound.org/]Freesound.org[/url] for [url=http://www.freesound.org/people/plingativator/sounds/188869/#]this sound effect[/url] which I used :)
author: DDD
